lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They say this influx is largely responsible for Spain's principal measure of money supply, the broad-based liquid assets in public hands (ALP), to have grown by an estimated 17 pct annualised rate in February, compared with January's 8.3 pct rise and an 11.4 pct rise during the whole of 1986.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In a statement issued late last night, the central bank said convertible peseta accounts, funds which are not subject to exchange controls, would also be subject to a 19 pct reserve requirement with effect from Friday.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Liquidity will be further tightened by the fortnightly Treasury Bill auction tomorrow and Friday's hike in reserve requirements, expected to absorb over 200 billion pesetas from the system.
